name: beholden
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling you have a duty to someone because they have done something for you: She wanted to be independent and beholden to no one.

Add to word list
feeling you have a duty to someone who has done something for you: They do not benefit from state subsidies and therefore are not beholden to the government.
